script: Ever wonder how your phone predicts the next word you’ll type? That’s N-gram language models in action! They guess words based on the ones before them—like how ‘I love’ might suggest ‘you’ next. Think of it like a choose-your-own-adventure book, where each word leads to the next. These models help computers understand and generate human-like text. They’re used in everything from autocorrect to chatbots, making tech smarter and more intuitive. Pretty cool, right?
